interestingcomments.content: Nikon D3500 vs Refurb Canon SL2? /!/ Looking into buying a camera as a hobbyist for travel pictures, wildlife and landscape pictures. I can buy a brand new D3500 with kit lens on amazon for $400 or a refurbished SL2 with kit lens direct from cannon for the same price. I will be learning from scratch. Thoughts on these cameras, or others I may be missing? I like the idea of the touchscreen on the sl2, but refurbished always makes me nervous. Thanks for any help!
